page.title: 08The Forestry Commision
page.content: MUCH OF THE FOREST AROUND ELLWOOD IS MANAGED BY THE FORESTRY COMMISSION . ALL THE TREES THAT HAVE BEEN HARVESTED IN THE YEAR ARE SOLD TO 9 DIFFERENT PLACES SUCH AS BOWATERS,ASHTON SAWMILLS,FORMWOOD,DORMIT, WOODCEMAIR, NON LOCAL SAWMILLS AND THREE LOCAL SAWMILLS. BOWATERS NEED SPRUCE PULPWOOD WITH WHICH THEY MAKE ALL KINDS OF PAPER,ASHTON SAWMILL USES HARDWOOD PULP TO MAKE FLUTING FOR CARDBOARD BOXES,FORMWOOD USES BEECH AND LARCH ROUNDWOOD TO MAKE SPECIAL CHIPBOARD,DORMIT USES MIXED CONIFER ROUNDWOOD FOR PACKAGING,WOODCEMAIR HAS PINE ROUNDWOOD TO MAKE CEMENT BONDED BOARDS AND THE FOUR SAWMILLS USE HARDWOOD MIXED CONIFER BARS AND STAKES CONIFER SAWLOGS,MINING TIMBER & FIREWOOD.
